en.title: LOTTERY
en.inputPlaceholder: Number of tickets you want to buy
en.loading: We’re looking forward to the first draw
en.faqText0: A lottery is a form of gambling game that involves drawing numbers at random for a prize. Waves’ lotteries are based on a decentralized randomizer – a provably fair number-generation service on the Waves Platform open protocol.
en.faqText1: Two lotteries will be held, on December 13 and January 13. Оn each of these days, the following prizes will be drawn: 12 prizes of 500 WAVES, 6 prizes of 1,000 WAVES and 4 prizes of 2,000 WAVES.
en.faqTitle2: How much does it cost to play?
en.faqText2: Each ticket costs 100 MRT. There is no limit to the number of tickets a player can purchase.
en.faqTitle3: How do you choose the winners?
en.faqText3: The winners are determined by an RSA-based randomizer. You can find out how it works here: https://habr.com/en/company/waves/blog/464395/.
en.placeholder: Ticket sales will start at 12:00 PM GMT
